Welcome_to_Portainer: 欢迎来到Portainer！ 单击下面列表中的任何端点以访问管理功能。
You_do_not_have_access_to_any_environmen: 您无权访问任何环境。 请联系您的管理员。
Found_a_bug_or_got_a_feature_idea_Lets_t: 发现了一个错误或有一个功能想法？ 我们来谈谈吧
Talk_to_your_friends: 告诉你的朋友和同事Portainer是多么棒的！
We_also_propose_a_fund: 我们还提出了一项基金特色计划，请与我们联系
Portainer_has_full_support_for_Docker: Portainer完全支持Docker> = 1.10和对Docker 1.9的部分支持（某些功能可能不可用）。
at_least_8_characters_long: 您的新密码长度必须至少为8个字符
cannot_change_pwd_when_using_LDAP: 使用LDAP身份验证时，无法更改密码。
Name: 名称
The_Docker_API_must_be_exposed_over_TCP: The Docker API must be exposed over TCP. You can find more information about how to expose the Docker API over TCP
Ensure_that_you_have_deployed_the_Portai: Ensure that you have deployed the Portainer agent in your cluster first. You can use execute the following command on any manager node to deploy it.
URL_or_IP_address_of_a_Docker_host_must_: URL or IP address of a Docker host. The Docker API must be exposed over a TCP port. Please refer to the Docker documentation to configure it.
URL_or_IP_address_where_exposed_containe: URL or IP address where exposed containers will be reachable. This field is optional and will default to the endpoint URL.
Endpoint_management_via_the_UI_is_disabl: Endpoint management via the UI is disabled.
You_can_still_manage_endpoint_access: You can still manage endpoint access.
Please_create_the_initial_administrator_: Please create the initial administrator user.
Connect_Portainer_to_the_Docker_environm: Connect Portainer to the Docker environment you want to manage.
Manage_the_Docker_environment_where_Port: Manage the Docker environment where Portainer is running.
Ensure_started_the_Portainer_container: Ensure that you have started the Portainer container with the following Docker flag:
Connectdirectly_Portainer_agent_running_: Connect directly to a Portainer agent running inside a Swarm cluster.
URLFORMAT: If you have started Portainer in the same overlay network as the agent, you can use tasks.AGENT_SERVICE_NAME:AGENT_SERVICE_PORT as the endpoint URL format.
Connect Portainer to a remote Docker environment using the Docker API over TCP.
URLorIPaddressofaDockerhostwithAPIexpose: URL or IP address of a Docker host with API exposed over TCP.
Enable_this_option_if_you_needto_specify: Enable this option if you need to specify TLS certificates to connect to the Docker endpoint.
Enable_this_option_if_you_need_to_authen: Enable this option if you need to authenticate server based on given CA.
Enable this option if you need to authenticate with a client certificate.
